description: A Flutter widget implementing a quiz page with question display, answer selection, score tracking, streak management, and summary presentation.

classes.name: QuizPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a multi-question quiz interface and manages its state.

classes.name: _QuizPageState
classes.description: State class for QuizPage, handling quiz logic, state updates, and UI rendering.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the quiz questions from the repository.

methods.name: _select
methods.description: Handles answer selection, updates score if correct.

methods.name: _next
methods.description: Advances to the next question or completes the quiz, updating streaks accordingly.

methods.name: _restart
methods.description: Restarts the quiz, resetting all state variables.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI, showing either the quiz question or the summary upon completion.

methods.name: _buildSummary
methods.description: Builds the summary view after quiz completion, showing the score and streak.

methods.name: _buildQuestion
methods.description: Builds the quiz question view with options and navigation buttons.
